name: Jadeware Effect
description: Casting a Martial Art Skill increases Affinity DMG by 10% and Affinity Rate by 7.5% (conditional)
notes: Condition: targets with lower Qi% than you or below 40% Qi. Lasts 8s; triggers once every 12s.

name: Hawkwing Set (4/4)
description: When any of your damage triggers Affinity, gain Hawkwing: increases Physical Attack by 2% for 5s, stacking up to 5 times (conditional)
notes: Modeling note: Hawkwing stacks up to 5x (+2% Physical Attack each, max +10%). This calculator models it as a single +10% Physical Attack boost and applies passive uptime as an averaging knob. To approximate average stacks, set uptime to (avgStacks/5)*100 (e.g. ~3 stacks avg -> 60%). Actual uptime depends on how often you trigger Affinity and the 5s buff duration.

name: Jadebreak
description: Increases Projectile skill damage by 30%. When a Projectile Skill or Heavy Attack Pursuit skill hits a Boss unit, deals 10% more damage. This effect lasts 15 seconds.
notes: Modeling note: the +10% is a boss-triggered 15s buff. This calculator approximates it as an uptime-weighted bonus; set passive uptime to reflect expected boss buff uptime. The +30% projectile damage is always-on (not uptime-weighted).

name: Spring Shock
description: During the effect's duration, the stamina cost and damage dealt by charged skills are increased by 4%. Lasts for 15 seconds and can stack up to 5 times.
notes: Modeling note: Spring Shock stacks up to 5x (+4% each). This calculator models only the charged-skill damage part as a single +20% boost and applies passive uptime as an averaging knob. To approximate average stacks, set uptime to (avgStacks/5)*100 (e.g. ~3 stacks avg -> 60%). Stamina cost is not currently modeled in the damage formulas/UI.

name: Trajectory Calculation Enhancement
description: Increases the Critical DMG of all Vernal Umbrella ballistic skills by 2.4% for every 50 Min Physical Attack (up to 36% increase at 750 Min Physical Attack).
notes: Applies only when the skill is tagged as ballistic AND weaponType is Umbrella (handled in createSkillContext).

name: Heavy Attack Pursuit Enhancement
description: Increases the Critical DMG of Heavy Attack Pursuit Moon Shatter Spring by 2.4% for every 50 Min Physical Attack, up to 36% increase at 750 Min Physical Attack.
notes: Applies only for the Moonlit Shatter Spring pursuit skills (handled in createSkillContext by skill id).
